explains: v. 发出嘎吱嘎吱的响声；把……揉成一团；使蜷缩，碾压；造发型
n. 嘎吱嘎吱的响声；碾压

sentences.en: Her feet scrunch on the gravel.
sentences.cn: 她的脚喀嚓喀嚓地踩在沙砾上。

sentences.en: She scrunch it up and throw it in the bin.
sentences.cn: 她把它揉成一团，扔进了垃圾箱。

sentences.en: Do the "scrunch test" to see if clothes stay wrinkly.
sentences.cn: 看衣服是否容易褶皱，做“揉捏测试”
